item.title: By: Erik de Bruijn
item.dc:creator: Erik de Bruijn
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/references/#comment-6">Mike</a>.
I'm researching RepRap and open hardware and I would love to be kept in the loop! Please let us know how we could participate (remotely) as much as possible! Joly: Live webcast would be best suitable for this...
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mike.

I’m researching RepRap and open hardware and I would love to be kept in the loop! Please let us know how we could participate (remotely) as much as possible! Joly: Live webcast would be best suitable for this…

item.title: By: GuruSantiago
item.dc:creator: GuruSantiago
item.description:
I can not attend, but I am very interested in being able to view the video. My company will provide open source hardware to aid people in learning electronics.
GuruSantiago
item.content:encoded:
I can not attend, but I am very interested in being able to view the video. My company will provide open source hardware to aid people in learning electronics.

GuruSantiago

item.title: By: Mikio@JAPAN
item.dc:creator: Mikio@JAPAN
item.description:
I can attend the event !.
But,video recording the event for viewing later would be wonderful.
item.content:encoded:
I can attend the event !.

But,video recording the event for viewing later would be wonderful.

item.title: By: John Boxall
item.dc:creator: John Boxall
item.description: A video recording of the talks for download or viewing later would be wonderful, living in Australia makes attendance somewhat expensive and wasteful. Have a great summit!
item.content:encoded: A video recording of the talks for download or viewing later would be wonderful, living in Australia makes attendance somewhat expensive and wasteful. Have a great summit!

item.title: By: Jeff Osier-Mixon
item.dc:creator: Jeff Osier-Mixon
item.description: I would love to attend the event but I'm having difficulty with travel. Live streaming, particularly interactive, would be pretty incredible. If there is any way to figure out the cost, perhaps those of us who are far away could assemble a donation pot of some kind?
item.content:encoded: I would love to attend the event but I’m having difficulty with travel. Live streaming, particularly interactive, would be pretty incredible. If there is any way to figure out the cost, perhaps those of us who are far away could assemble a donation pot of some kind?

item.title: By: Joly MacFie
item.dc:creator: Joly MacFie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/references/#comment-6">Mike</a>.
Hi Mike
Alicia has asked me to video the event for later webcast and I have promised to do so. A live webcast is still a possibility.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mike.

Hi Mike

Alicia has asked me to video the event for later webcast and I have promised to do so. A live webcast is still a possibility.

item.title: By: LukaP
item.dc:creator: LukaP
item.description:
Video streaming or video download after event would be great!
There is many of us from around the world who can not make it to the event :( This would also enable us to keep our CO2 footprint low since we would not have to travel :)
All the best!
item.content:encoded:
Video streaming or video download after event would be great!

There is many of us from around the world who can not make it to the event üôÅ
This would also enable us to keep our CO2 footprint low since we would not have to travel üôÇ

All the best!

item.title: By: renato gomes sobral barcellos
item.dc:creator: renato gomes sobral barcellos
item.description:
I'm researcher at the Federal Fluminense University and I will develop the open hardware research group here. My participation in 23rd open hardware is not easy. I want receive the informations, articles and other publications for discuss with researchers.
thanks
item.content:encoded:
I’m researcher at the Federal Fluminense University and I will develop the open hardware research group here. My participation in 23rd open hardware is not easy. I want receive the informations, articles and other publications for discuss with researchers.

thanks

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: I would love to attend to the conference but living inthe UK it isnt that easy.I am hoping that it will have a twitter element and even a streaming video or download video fter the event. Have a great time and make sure Creativity lives something we in th UK are struggling with under a new (none Creative) government.
item.content:encoded:
I would love to attend to the conference but living inthe UK it isnt that easy.I am hoping that it will have a twitter element and even a streaming video or download video fter the event.
Have a great time and make sure Creativity lives something we in th UK are struggling with under a new (none Creative) government.
